a.n: Slim, Harrison & Jones live in Brussels

p.k: What do Sunnyland Slim, Wilbert Harrison and Curtis Jones have in common? Right, the piano and the blues! Each has his individual style, and this 1964 recording shows an amazing collection of great blues tunes by the above jazz legends.
p.d: What do Sunnyland Slim, Wilbert Harrison and Curtis Jones have in common? Right, the piano and the blues! Each has his individual style, and this 1964 recording shows an amazing collection of great blues tunes by the above jazz legends. During this concert, recorded in Brussels, the musicians play and sings blues classics such as It's you baby, Kansas City, and Good Woman.
